'React' is the first official live album, and fifth overall, by British new wave
band The Fixx, released in 1987. It was recorded during two concerts in Canada
in 1986 in the band's tour in support of their album [[Walkabout (The Fixx
album)|Walkabout]]. The album contains three new studio tracks: "Big Wall",
"Rules and Schemes", and "Don't Be Scared", which was released as a single. Also
included is a re-recorded studio version of "Red Skies".
